p: In the treatment group, HCC developed in 20 (4.1%) patients during a median follow-up duration of 46 months. In this group, the 2-, 4-, and 6-year cumulative HCC development rates of patients with LC were significantly greater than those without LC (8.9%, 13.5%, and 19.0% vs 0.6%, 1.4%, and 2.1%, respectively, P < 0.01) (Fig. 3A), and the 2-, 4-, and 6-year cumulative HCC development rates of patients with genotype 1 were significantly greater than those with other genotypes (2.8%, 4.1%, and 6.8% vs 0.4%, 2.1%, and 2.1%, respectively, P = 0.047) (Fig. 3B).
